src:
Live Streaming Atalanta vs Manchester City di Vidio
06 Nov 2019, 22:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester City bisa memastikan kelolosan ke babak 16 besar Liga Champions saat melawan Atalanta. Tergantung partai lainnya, City juga bisa dipastikan jadi juara grup dengan dua laga tersisa.
Pemimpin klasemen Manchester City akan main tandang melawan tim debutan dan juru kunci Atalanta pada matchday 4 Grup C Liga Champions 2019/20, Kamis (7/11/2019). Ditunggu laga akbar kontra Liverpool di Premier League akhir pekan ini, sang pelatih Josep Guardiola mungkin akan merotasi beberapa pemainnya.
Atalanta memainkan laga kandangnya di San Siro, Milan. Pasalnya, stadion kandang Atalanta, Stadio Azzurri d'Italia, belum memenuhi standar UEFA.
Pada matchday 3, yang merupakan pertemuan perdana mereka, City menang telak 5-1 atas Atalanta di Etihad Stadium. Atalanta sempat unggul terlebih dahulu melalui penalti Ruslan Malinovskyi. Namun, City berbalik menang lewat 2 gol Sergio Aguero (1 penalti) dan hat-trick Raheem Sterling.
City memiliki poin sempurna 9, diikuti Dinamo Zagreb (4), Shakhtar Donetsk (4), dan Atalanta (0).
Kemenangan atas Atalanta di San Siro akan meloloskan City ke babak 16 besar dengan dua laga tersisa. City bahkan akan dipastikan jadi juara Grup C jika partai lainnya, Dinamo Zagreb vs Shakhtar Donetsk, berkesudahan imbang.

Simak live streaming Atalanta vs Manchester City di bawah ini.
text:
Live Streaming of Atalanta vs Manchester City in Video
Nov 6 2019, 22:30 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester City can ensure a place in the last 16 of the Champions League against Atalanta. Depending on other parties, City can also be sure to be group winners with two matches remaining.
Leaders Manchester City will play away against debutal team and Atalanta keeper on Matchday 4 Group C Champions League 2019/20 on Thursday (11/07/2019). Awaited a big match against Liverpool in the Premier League this weekend, the coach Josep Guardiola might rotate some of his players.
Atalanta plays his home game at San Siro, Milan. The reason is Atalanta's home stadium, Stadio Azzurri d'Italia, has not met UEFA standards.
On Matchday 3, which was their first meeting, City won a landslide 5-1 win over Atalanta at the Etihad Stadium. Atalanta had superior first through a penalty Ruslan Malinovskyi. However, City turned victorious through 2 goals from Sergio Aguero (1 penalty) and Raheem Sterling's hat-trick.
City has a perfect 9 points, followed by Dinamo Zagreb (4), Shakhtar Donetsk (4) and Atalanta (0).
Victory over Atalanta at the San Siro will pass City into the last 16 with two matches remaining. City will even be certain to win Group C if the other party, Dinamo Zagreb vs Shakhtar Donetsk, ends in a draw.

Check out the live streaming of Atalanta vs Manchester City below.
